title: Ad viewer!
showingAll: This is a list of all ads.
showingAllAdded: Added a new ad! This is a list of all ads.
showingAllEdited: Edited an ad! This is a list of all ads.
showingSome: This is a list of some ads.
amount: Amount of ads in the list:
configEmail: Contact information for the ad representative
configNumber: Maximum amount of concurrent ads by a single user
